Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: In terms of learning, I learned little from the teacher and not that much from GenAI. In my experience, GenAI gives more instruction on ways of writing while teachers critique the information and presentation. I learn how to write compellingly from teachers, I learn how teachers want me to write from GenAI.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Messages about how to change my writing and the strengths I already have in writing made me feel more important when my teacher gave them to me. When GenAI gives editing help I don't feel anything towards it.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: GenAI gives much more feedback that can be used directly than Teachers. By this, I mean in sheer volume the comments on a piece of writing will be more and most suggestions can be implemented using or removing a couple of words while teachers give feedback that could help you in the long term but may be much more difficult to incorporate in work.
